name: Explorer (IvanC314)
description:
Explore a randomly generated 3d terrain. Harvest materials for some upgrades. Different terrain every time. Has sheep, rabbits, bats, and zombies. Build stuff with your materials. Survive the night-time.

WASD/Arrow Keys to move, Space to Jump, Left Click to harvest/attack

Right Click to eat, Q and E to swap through inventory.

Best played full screen.
